name: hover_and_capture
title: Hover to reveal UI then capture
description: Move the mouse to a target location to reveal hover state, then capture evidence.

content.text: Goal: {{goal}}. Move the cursor with `move_mouse` to ({{x}}, {{y}}) using duration={{duration}}. Avoid clicking. After the hover settles, call `take_screenshot` (use output_dir={{output_path}} if provided) so the hover state is captured. Return the screenshot path, any warnings, and a brief note on whether the target UI reacted.
